string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: The fastest application for saving all your personal data, compatible with almost 100% devices
Keep everything secured with the latest encryption methods: no more worries ever
Sync your data with the cloud and restore it later. A personal and private storage will be able for you and only for this application
Save accounts, passwords, security codes: everything what you want. Personalize your application and enjoy your privacy

resources.string: There was an error while trying to create a backup
There is not any backup available
Please, enter the password you used when you created this backup. It may not be the same as the one you have right now
There was an error while trying to restore data
